reviewText: very good ,I use it to sleep

The Alpine Rivers DVD is beautifully shot. Each scene exudes a sense of tranquility. We especially enjoyed the winter scenes shot in Oregon.  One can enjoy the scenery without having to suffer the snowy elements.
When you put this on and close your eyes its like being outside...

There's nothing like the sound of an Alpine river. The bubbling sounds of the water are so peaceful and calming. I just love listening to it. The great composition and diversity of the scenes is cleverly chosen and executed. Every time I play it, an atmosphere of calm and tranquility enters the room.
